Branëu

Branëu is a luxury lifestyle brand based in Los Angeles, California. The concept for this brand lies in sourcing high quality fabrics, minimal design with a luxury feel for men and women.

Designed website on Squarespace Platform sharing the brand identity, culture and products for sale. We also design a monthly newsletter and manage all website maintenance.

Skills Used:
  • UX/UI Design
  • E-commerce Web Development
